item.title: How to install XGBoost in Python for macOS? (2020.02)
item.description: Our goal is to install the XGBoost package, which can be compiled with multi-threads. Therefore, we need to install “GCC” which can compile multithread code. Here are the clear goals: Install GCC Install XGBoost package What have already installed: Anacoda Python 3 Homebrew Installation GCC Obtain gcc from homebrew and check the version of gcc. $ brew install gcc $ gcc -dumpversion Here, I was suggested by ref 2 to uncomment the following two lines in Makefile.
